title: Publish x86 32bit VMs to check that everything goes well on both x86 and x64.
body: AFAIK the available VMs in https://dev.windows.com/en-us/microsoft-edge/tools/vms are only x64 .

comments.body: I feel it's also important to point out that this locks out ANY developer using a budget laptop, as those CPUs do not support hardware visualization, which is required by 64-bit VMs (they won't run without it, even on 64-bit CPUs). I have no feasible way to test in Edge, and it will be a long time before I start to do so if it means purchasing a new laptop for no reason other than to test in one minority-share browser!
